hadith.chapterTitle: Superiority of Poor, Weak and unrenowned Muslims
hadith.body:
Abu Hurairah (May Allah be pleased with him) reported: Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said, "Many a person with shaggy and dusty hair, dusty and driven away from doors (because of their poverty and shabby clothes) were to swear by Allah (that something would happen), Allah will certainly make it happen".

[Muslim].

hadith.chapterTitle: - باب فضل ضعفة المسلمين والفقراء الخاملين
hadith.body: - وعنه قال‏:‏ قال رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم‏:‏ ‏"‏رب أشعث أغبر مدفوع بالأبواب لو أقسم على الله لأبره ‏"‏ ‏(‏‏(‏رواه مسلم‏)‏‏)‏‏.‏
